page.title: 17ENVIRONMENT OF RAMSGATE
page.content: {Climate:}average rainfall=429.9mm; average sunshine=1582.6hours;average temperature in July=17C/in January 5C. {Geology:}flint embedded in layers of chalk for 60% of the area with some Headbrick earth and other minerals near the surface.The flint is used in local churches. {Vegetation:}trees in parks with grassy areas;rock pools from the crumbling chalk house crabs and seaweeds.Wild grasses and mosses live on the cliff making good ledges for gulls and pigeons.Shepherd's Purse,Sycamore trees,stinging nettles,common Fumitory and wild grasses are common. {Wildlife:}the only wild animals are hedgehogs,mice and small birds.Common birds include the house sparrow,tree sparrow,goldfinch,chaffinch,blackbird, thrush,great tits and common and herring gulls.
